participant_1.background:
I try to start my mornings with a fresh cup of coffee and a healthy breakfast.
i design jewelry when i have spare time.
i love to read fantasy novels and poetry.
I sometimes get a little too nostalgic when I think about my childhood.
i love to fish.

participant_2.background:
I grew up playing make believe with my family.
i listen to rock music.
I want to be in good shape for my cosplay at Comic Con, so I try to exercise every day.
I live in a small home and love my collection of comic books.
i have a nice smile.

content.text: What's your favorite book you've read recently?
I just finished The Name of the Wind, it's a fantasy novel. Did you like it?
I've heard great things about it! I've been looking for a new fantasy novel to read.
It's a really good one, but it's a bit long. It's the first book in a trilogy, so if you like it there's more to look forward to.
I love long books! I'm a slow reader, so I don't mind. I'm always looking for new recommendations.
I'm the same way! I love to get lost in a good book. What are some of your favorite authors?
I love J.R.R. Tolkien, George R.R. Martin, and Brandon Sanderson.
I love Tolkien, too! I've read a lot of his books. I've also read some of George R.R. Martin's books, but I haven't read any Brandon Sanderson books yet.
Sanderson is really good! He's a little different from Tolkien and Martin, but I think you'd like him.
I'll have to check him out! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! I hope you enjoy his books.
